              <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
            <div class="BRPFPageHeader" style="width: 100%;"></div>
          </div>
          <div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, on August 15, 2022, the parties to the Federal Action filed a stipulation and proposed order to continue the stay of the Federal Action subject
              to substantially similar terms and conditions, which the Federal Court granted on August 17, 2022;</div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
            </div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, on October 14, 2022, the parties to the Federal Action filed a stipulation to continue the stay of the Federal Action subject to substantially
              similar terms and conditions, which the Federal Court granted on October 14, 2022;</div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
            </div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, after meeting and conferring regarding a proposed schedule for further proceedings following the February 1, 2023 expiration of the preceding
              stay, on March 20, 2023, the parties to the Federal Action filed a stipulation to set a briefing schedule for Nominal Defendant Apple&#8217;s motion to dismiss the action under Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 23.1, which the Federal Court granted
              on March 27, 2023; </div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
            </div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, on May 19, 2023, the parties to the Federal Action filed a stipulation extending Federal Plaintiffs&#8217; time to complete their ongoing investigation
              of matters relevant to their allegations and to file their consolidated complaint, which the Federal Court granted on May 23, 2023;</div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
            </div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, on October 5, 2023, the parties to the Federal Action filed a stipulation advising the Federal Court that they had executed a memorandum of
              understanding to settle the litigation, and commenced negotiations regarding formal stipulation of settlement to be presented for the Federal Court&#8217;s approval;</div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
            </div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, pursuant to the Federal Court&#8217;s October 26, 2023 Order Setting Compliance Deadline, on November 17, 2023, the parties to the Federal Action
              further advised the Federal Court regarding the status of their negotiations regarding a stipulation of settlement and all exhibits thereto;</div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
            </div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, on November 20, 2023, the Federal Court entered an Order Setting Compliance Deadline Re: Settlement, requiring the filing of a motion for
              preliminary approval of the settlement or a joint statement explaining any noncompliance on or before January 26, 2024;</div>
            <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
            </div>
            <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
              <div class="BRPFPageFooter" style="width: 100%;">
                <div>
                  <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                      <tr>
                        <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- - 5 - -</font></td>
                      </tr>
                      <tr>
                        <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt; border-top: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                          <div style="font-family: Arial; text-align: center;">AMENDED STIPULATION AND AGREEMENT OF COMPROMISE, SETTLEMENT, AND RELEASE</div>
                        </td>
                      </tr>

                  </table>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
              <div class="BRPFPageHeader" style="width: 100%;"></div>
            </div>
            <div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, pursuant to the Federal Court&#8217;s November 20, 2023 Order Setting Compliance Deadline, on
                  January 16, 2024, the parties to the Federal Action further advise the Federal Court regarding the status of their negotiations regarding a stipulation of settlement and all exhibits thereto; and</font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                </font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on January 19, 2024, the Federal Court entered an Order Setting Compliance Deadline Re:
                  Settlement, requiring the filing of a motion for preliminary approval of the settlement or a joint statement explaining any noncompliance on or before March 8, 2024;<u></u></font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><u> <br>
                  </u></font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><u>CALIFORNIA COURT PROCEEDINGS</u> </font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                </font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on September 17, 2019, plaintiff Tim Himstreet filed a derivative action in California Court
                  captioned as </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Himstreet v. Cook, et al.</font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">, Case No. 19CV355213 (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Himstreet </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Action&#8221;) asserting claims similar to those raised in the Federal Action;</font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                </font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on September 30, 2019, the parties to the </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Himstreet </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Action filed a stipulation and proposed order to stay the </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Himstreet







                </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Action on terms similar to those in the Federal Action, which the California Court granted on October 1, 2019;</font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                </font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on March 11, 2020, the parties to the </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Himstreet </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Action filed a stipulation to continue the stay of the </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Himstreet







                </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Action, which the California Court granted on March 11, 2020;</font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                </font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on August 12, 2020, the parties to the </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Himstreet </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Action filed a stipulation to continue the stay of the </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Himstreet







                </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Action, which the California Court granted on August 13, 2020;</font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                </font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on August 17, 2020, plaintiff Steven Hill filed a derivative action in California Court
                  captioned as </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Hill v. Cook, et al.</font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">, 20CV369387 (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Hill </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Action&#8221;) asserting claims similar to those raised in the Federal Action;</font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                </font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on November 16, 2020, the California Court entered an order consolidating the </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Himstreet </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Action and </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Hill </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Action (hereafter, the &#8220;California Action&#8221;) and continuing the case management conferences in the respective actions;</font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                </font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on January 21, 2021, the California Court ordered to extend the stay of the California
                  Action;</font></div>
              <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                </font></div>
              <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                <div class="BRPFPageFooter" style="width: 100%;">
                  <div>
                    <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                        <tr>
                          <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- - 6 - -</font></td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr>
                          <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt; border-top: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                            <div style="font-family: Arial; text-align: center;">AMENDED STIPULATION AND AGREEMENT OF COMPROMISE, SETTLEMENT, AND RELEASE</div>
                          </td>
                        </tr>

                    </table>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                  <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                <div class="BRPFPageHeader" style="width: 100%;"></div>
              </div>
              <div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on February 10, 2022, the California Court ordered to continue the case management
                    conference;</font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                  </font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on May 5, 2022, the California Court ordered to continue the case management conference
                    for the California Action;</font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                  </font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on July 1, 2022, the California Court ordered to continue the stay of the California
                    Action and continue the case management conference;</font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                  </font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on October 6, 2022, the California Court ordered to continue the stay of the California
                    Action and continue the case management conference;</font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                  </font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on February 14, 2023, the California Court ordered to continue the case management
                    conference for the California Action; and</font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                  </font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on March 24, 2023, the California Court ordered to continue the case management conference
                    for the California Action and ordered that the discovery and responsive pleading stay remain in place pending further order of the California Court; <u></u></font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><u> <br>
                    </u></font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><u>SHAREHOLDER LITIGATION DEMAND</u> </font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                  </font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on November 13, 2018, the Demanding Shareholders made a litigation demand on Apple&#8217;s board
                    of directors asserting claims similar to those raised in the Federal Action (the &#8220;Demand&#8221;); and </font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                  </font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on December 9, 2018, Apple&#8217;s board formed an advisory Demand Evaluation Committee (&#8220;DEC&#8221;)
                    to review and investigate the Demand, with the advice of independent counsel, and report back to the full board concerning its conclusions and recommendations; <u></u></font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><u> <br>
                    </u></font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><u>THE PARTIES REACHED THE SETTLEMENT THROUGH MEDIATOR FACILITATED</u>&#160;<u>ARM&#8217;S-LENGTH NEGOTIATIONS</u> </font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                  </font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, the Parties agreed to participate in a mediation session on January 31, 2022, before
                    (Hon.) Layn Phillips of Phillips ADR (the &#8220;Mediator&#8221;), a nationally recognized mediator with extensive experience mediating complex shareholder disputes similar to the Actions;<br>
                  </font></div>
                <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                  </font></div>
                <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                  <div class="BRPFPageFooter" style="width: 100%;">
                    <div>
                      <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                          <tr>
                            <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- - 7 - -</font></td>
                          </tr>
                          <tr>
                            <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt; border-top: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                              <div style="font-family: Arial; text-align: center;">AMENDED STIPULATION AND AGREEMENT OF COMPROMISE, SETTLEMENT, AND RELEASE</div>
                            </td>
                          </tr>

                      </table>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                    <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                  <div class="BRPFPageHeader" style="width: 100%;"></div>
                </div>
                <div>
                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, on January 28, 2022, the plaintiffs in the Federal Action and California Action
                      submitted a mediation statement, made a settlement demand on Defendants, and requested certain documents, which Defendants agreed to provide;</font></div>
                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                    </font></div>
                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, the Parties did not reach an agreement resolving the derivative litigation during the
                      January 31, 2022 mediation session, but agreed to continue their settlement discussions under the aegis of the Mediator;</font></div>
                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 36pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><br>
                    </font></div>
                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> WHEREAS, counsel for the Parties participated in another, in-person mediation session before the
                      Mediator on April 6, 2023. At the mediation session, the Parties engaged in discussions regarding the strengths and weaknesses of the claims and defenses at issue, both indirectly through the Mediator and directly in joint sessions
                      attended by counsel for the Parties and the relevant insurers. During the joint sessions, the Company provided detailed confidential information regarding the technical and practical considerations that drove its decision-making with
                      respect to the iOS performance management updates.&#160;&#160; The parties debated their competing views of the essential facts, legal claims and defenses, and the broad range of possible litigation outcomes. The parties also discussed a range
                      of remedial options and were able to agree on a set of principles and target areas for corporate governance enhancements to flesh out through further negotiations;</font><br>
                  </div>
                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                    </font></div>
                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, the Parties continued their mediation efforts for several months following the </font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">April 2023 in-person mediation session, during which the Parties exchanged written proposals and <font style="font-family: Arial;">counter proposals with the assistance and guidance of the Mediator;</font></font></div>
                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                      </font></font></div>
                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, the Parties ultimately reached an agreement in principle on the material
                        substantive consideration for the Settlement, and negotiated the terms of a written memorandum of understanding outlining the essential terms and conditions for the release of all claims asserted in the Actions in consideration for
                        Apple&#8217;s agreement to adopt, implement, and/or maintain the corporate governance and oversight enhancements as set forth in Exhibit A hereto (the &#8220;Enhancements&#8221;);</font></font></div>
                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 72pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><br>
                      </font></font></div>
                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> WHEREAS, after reaching agreement on the substantive material terms of the
                        Settlement, the Parties commenced negotiations facilitated by the Mediator regarding reasonable attorneys&#8217;</font></font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> fees and expenses to be paid to Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel, subject
                      to Court approval, in consideration for the substantial benefits conferred upon Apple and its shareholders by the Settlement; and </font></div>
                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                      </font></font></div>
                  <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                    <div class="BRPFPageFooter" style="width: 100%;">
                      <div>
                        <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                            <tr>
                              <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- - 8 - -</font></td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                              <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt; border-top: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                <div style="font-family: Arial; text-align: center;">AMENDED STIPULATION AND AGREEMENT OF COMPROMISE, SETTLEMENT, AND RELEASE</div>
                              </td>
                            </tr>

                        </table>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                      <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                    <div class="BRPFPageHeader" style="width: 100%;"></div>
                  </div>
                  <div>
                    <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, this Stipulation (together with the exhibits hereto), which has been duly executed by
                        the undersigned signatories on behalf of their respective clients, reflects the final and binding agreement by and among the Parties;</font></div>
                    <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <u></u></font></div>
                    <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><u> <br>
                        </u></font></div>
                    <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><u>THE PARTIES AGREE THE SETTLEMENT CONFERS SUBSTANTIAL BENEFITS AND&#160;SERVES THE BEST INTERESTS OF
                          APPLE AND ITS SHAREHOLDERS</u></font></div>
                    <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><u></u></font></div>
                    <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                      </font></div>
                    <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> WHEREAS, Plaintiffs brought their claims in good faith and continue to believe that their
                        claims have merit but, based upon Plaintiffs&#8217; and Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel&#8217;s investigation and prosecution of the Actions, Plaintiffs and Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel have concluded that the terms and conditions of this Stipulation are fair,
                        reasonable, and adequate, and in the best interests of the Company and its shareholders;</font></div>
                    <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                      </font></div>
                    <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> WHEREAS, based on Plaintiffs&#8217; oversight of the prosecution of this matter and with the advice
                        of their counsel, Plaintiffs have agreed to settle and release the claims asserted in the Actions&#160; pursuant&#160; to&#160; the&#160; terms&#160; and&#160; provisions&#160; of&#160; this&#160; Stipulation,&#160; after&#160; considering&#160; (a)&#160; the substantial benefits conferred upon
                        Apple and its shareholders through the corporate governance protections provided under the proposed Settlement; and (b) the desirability of guaranteeing those benefits&#160; by&#160; permitting&#160; the&#160; Settlement&#160; to&#160; be&#160; consummated&#160; as&#160;
                        provided&#160; by&#160; the&#160; terms&#160; of this Stipulation, and avoiding the uncertainties, delays, costs, and substantial risks entailed in further litigation;</font></div>
                    <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                      </font></div>
                    <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> WHEREAS, Defendants have denied, and continue to deny, that they committed, or aided and
                        abetted in the commission of, any violation of law or duty or engaged in any wrongful acts whatsoever, including specifically those alleged in the Actions, and expressly maintain that they have complied with their statutory,
                        fiduciary, and other legal duties, and that at all relevant times they acted in good faith and in a manner they reasonably believed to be in the best interests of Apple and its shareholders;</font></div>
                    <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                      </font></div>
                    <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                      <div class="BRPFPageFooter" style="width: 100%;">
                        <div>
                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                              <tr>
                                <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- - 9 - -</font></td>
                              </tr>
                              <tr>
                                <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt; border-top: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                  <div style="font-family: Arial; text-align: center;">AMENDED STIPULATION AND AGREEMENT OF COMPROMISE, SETTLEMENT, AND RELEASE</div>
                                </td>
                              </tr>

                          </table>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                        <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                      <div class="BRPFPageHeader" style="width: 100%;"></div>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">WHEREAS, Defendants have also taken into account the burden, expense, and uncertainties
                          inherent in further litigation, and have therefore determined that it is in the best interests of the Company for the Actions to be settled in the manner and upon the terms and conditions set forth in this Stipulation;</font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                        </font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> WHEREAS, the Board, including each of its independent, non-employee directors (including the
                          members of the DEC), advised by outside counsel for the Company, has unanimously approved a resolution reflecting the Board&#8217;s determination, in the good faith exercise of its business judgment, that the Settlement confers
                          substantial benefits upon Apple and its shareholders, and that the Settlement and each of its terms are fair and reasonable and serve the best interests of Apple and its shareholders; and</font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                        </font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> WHEREAS, each of the Parties recognizes and acknowledges that the Actions have been
                          initiated, filed, and prosecuted by Plaintiffs in good faith and defended by Defendants in good faith, that the Actions are being voluntarily settled with the advice of counsel, and that the terms of the Settlement are fair,
                          reasonable, and adequate.</font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"> <br>
                        </font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;">NOW THEREFORE, IT IS STIPULATED AND AGREED</font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">, by and among the Parties, by and through their respective undersigned counsel, in consideration of the benefits flowing from the Settlement, that all Settled Claims (as defined below) shall be and
                          hereby are fully and finally settled,&#160; compromised,&#160; and&#160; released, and&#160; that&#160; the&#160; claims against&#160; Defendants&#160; in the Derivative Actions shall be dismissed with prejudice, upon and subject to the terms and conditions of this
                          Stipulation, as follows: <u></u></font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><u> <br>
                          </u></font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>CERTAIN DEFINITIONS</u></font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                          </font></font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; As used in this Stipulation and all exhibits attached hereto and made
                            a part hereof, the following capitalized terms shall have the following meanings:</font></font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                          </font></font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> (a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Actions&#8221; or &#8220;Derivative Actions&#8221; means the Federal Action, the
                            California Action, and the Demand.</font></font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                          </font></font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> (b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Apple,&#8221; &#8220;Nominal Defendant,&#8221; or the &#8220;Company&#8221; means Apple Inc.</font></font></div>
                      <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                          </font></font></div>
                      <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                        <div class="BRPFPageFooter" style="width: 100%;">
                          <div>

                                </tr>

                        <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 54pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Apple&#8217;s Counsel&#8221; means the law firm of Orrick, Herrington &amp; Sutcliffe LLP<br>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>

                        <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 54pt;">(d) &#160; &#160; &#8220;Board&#8221; means Apple&#8217;s Board of Directors.</div>
                        <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
                        </div>

                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-style: italic;">
                            <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: normal;">(e) &#160; &#160;</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-style: normal;"> </font><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-style: normal;">&#8220;California Action&#8221; means the shareholder derivative action captioned</font> <font style="font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">In re</font></font></font>

                                    Complaints&#8221; means the Verified Shareholder Derivative Complaints, dated September 17, 2019 and August 17, 2020, filed in the California Action.</font></font></font></div>

                                    the Superior Court of the State of California in the County of Santa Clara.</font></font></font></div>

                                    means Tim Himstreet and Steven Hill.</font></font></font></div>
                            <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                                  </font></font></font></div>
                            <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Claims&#8221; means any and all manner of claims, including any Unknown
                                    Claims, debts, demands, rights, interests, actions, suits, causes of action, cross-claims, counter- claims, charges, judgments, obligations, setoffs, or liabilities for any obligations of any kind whatsoever (however
                                    denominated), for fees, costs, penalties, damages whenever incurred, and liabilities of any nature whatsoever (including, without limitation, demands for rescission, damages, interest, attorneys&#8217; fees, and any other
                                    costs, expenses or liabilities whatsoever, including joint and several), whether based on federal, state, local, statutory or common law, in equity, or on any other law, rule, regulation, ordinance, contract, or the law
                                    of any foreign jurisdiction, whether fixed or contingent, known or unknown, liquidated or unliquidated, suspected or unsuspected, asserted or unasserted, matured or unmatured.</font></font></font></div>
                            <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                                  </font></font></font></div>
                            <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;">(j)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Complaints&#8221; means the Federal Complaints and the California
                                    Complaints.</font></font></font></div>
                            <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                                  </font></font></font></div>
                            <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;">(k)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Current Apple Shareholders&#8221; means any person or entity that has
                                    held Apple common stock as of the date of the execution of this Stipulation and continues to hold their Apple common stock through the date of the Settlement Fairness Hearing.</font></font></font></div>

                                    the Federal Action and/or the California Action: Timothy D. Cook, Luca Maestri, Craig Federighi,</font></font></font> Arthur D. Levinson, Albert Gore, Jr., Andrea Jung, James A. Bell, Ronald D. Sugar, Robert A. Iger, and
                              Susan L. Wagner.<br>

                                      date by which all of the events and conditions specified in paragraph 24 of this Stipulation have been met and have occurred or have been waived.</font></font></font></div>

                                      Complaints dated August 19, 2019 and September 20, 2019, filed in the Federal Action.</font></font></font></div>

                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;">(v)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Final&#8221; with respect to the Judgment or any other court order means: (i) if no appeal is filed, the expiration date of the time for filing or noticing of any
                                  appeal of the Judgment or order; or (ii) if there is an appeal from the Judgment or order, (a) the date of final dismissal of all such appeals, or the final dismissal of any proceeding on <font style="font-style: italic;">certiorari


                                  </font>or otherwise, or (b) the date the Judgment or order is finally affirmed on appeal, the expiration of the time to file a petition for a writ of <font style="font-style: italic;">certiorari </font>or other form of
                                  review, or the denial of a writ of certiorari or other form of review, and, if certiorari or other form of review is granted, the date of final affirmance following review pursuant&#160; to that grant.&#160;&#160; However, any appeal&#160;
                                  or&#160; proceeding seeking&#160; subsequent judicial review pertaining solely to an order issued with respect to attorneys&#8217; fees or expenses shall not in any way delay or preclude the Judgment from becoming Final.</div>
                                <div>
                                  <div> <br>
                                  </div>
                                  <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;">(w)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Enhancements&#8221; means the corporate governance enhancements identified in Exhibit A hereto.</div>
                                  <div> <br>
                                  </div>
                                  <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;">(x)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Judgment&#8221; means the final judgment, substantially in the form attached hereto as Exhibit C, to be entered by the Federal Court approving the Settlement.</div>
                                  <div> <br>
                                  </div>
                                  <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;">(y)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Notice&#8221; means, collectively, the Notice of Pendency and Proposed Settlement of Shareholder Derivative Actions, substantially in the form attached hereto as
                                    Exhibit B-1&#160; (&#8220;Long&#160; Form&#160; Notice),&#160; and&#160; the Summary Notice&#160; of&#160; Proposed&#160; Settlement&#160; of Shareholder Derivative Actions, substantially in the form attached hereto as Exhibit B-2 (&#8220;Summary Notice&#8221;).</div>
                                  <div> <br>
                                  </div>
                                  <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;">(z)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Notice Costs&#8221; means all costs, fees, and expenses related to providing notice of the Settlement to Current Apple Shareholders.</div>
                                  <div> <br>
                                  </div>
                                  <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;">(aa)&#160;&#160; &#8220;Parties&#8221; means Plaintiffs, Defendants, and the Company.</div>
                                  <div> <br>
                                  </div>
                                  <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;">(bb)&#160;&#160; &#8220;Plaintiffs&#8221; means the Federal Plaintiffs, the California Plaintiffs, and the Demanding Shareholders.</div>
                                  <div> <br>
                                  </div>
                                  <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;">(cc)&#160;&#160; &#8220;Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel&#8221; means the law firms of Robbins LLP, Weiss Law LLP, Glancy Prongay &amp; Murray LLP, Herman Jones LLP, The Mehdi Firm, PC, and Purcell &amp;
                                    Lefkowitz LLP.</div>
                                  <div> <br>
                                  </div>
                                  <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;">(dd)&#160;&#160; &#8220;Preliminary Approval Order&#8221; means the order, substantially in the form attached hereto as Exhibit B, to be entered by the Court, preliminarily approving the
                                    Settlement, scheduling the Settlement Fairness Hearing, and directing that notice of the Settlement be provided to Current Apple Shareholders.</div>
                                  <div>&#160;</div>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                              <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                <div class="BRPFPageFooter" style="width: 100%;">
                                  <div>
                                    <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                                        <tr>
                                          <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- - 13 - -</font></td>
                                        </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                          <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt; border-top: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                            <div style="font-family: Arial; text-align: center;">AMENDED STIPULATION AND AGREEMENT OF COMPROMISE, SETTLEMENT, AND RELEASE</div>
                                          </td>

                                  <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                <div class="BRPFPageHeader" style="width: 100%;"></div>
                              </div>
                              <div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><a name="z_Hlk165539678"></a><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">(ee)</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">&#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;">&#8220;Released Defendants&#8217; Parties&#8221; means Defendants, the Company, and any entity in which the Company has a controlling interest, as well as their respective current and former parents,
                                        affiliates, subsidiaries, officers, directors, agents, successors, predecessors, assigns, assignees, partnerships, partners, committees, joint ventures, trustees, trusts, employees, immediate family members, insurers
                                        and reinsurers (in their capacities as such), consultants, experts, and attorneys.</font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                                      </font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> (ff)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Released Parties&#8221; means the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties and
                                        the Released Plaintiffs&#8217; Parties.</font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                                      </font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> (gg)&#160;&#160; &#8220;Released Plaintiffs&#8217; Parties&#8221; means Plaintiffs, Plaintiffs&#8217;
                                        Counsel, and any entity in which any Plaintiff has a controlling interest, as well as their respective current and former parents,&#160; affiliates,&#160; subsidiaries,&#160; officers,&#160; directors,&#160; agents,&#160; successors,&#160;
                                        predecessors, assigns, assignees,&#160;&#160; partnerships,&#160;&#160; partners,&#160;&#160; committees,&#160;&#160; joint&#160;&#160; ventures,&#160;&#160; trustees,&#160;&#160; trusts, employees, immediate family members, insurers and reinsurers (in their capacities as such),
                                        consultants, experts, and attorneys.</font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                                      </font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> (hh)&#160;&#160; &#8220;Releases&#8221; means the releases set forth in paragraphs 4-7 of
                                        this Stipulation.</font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                                      </font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> (ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Settled&#160; Claims&#8221;&#160;&#160; means&#160; the&#160;&#160; Settled&#160; Defendants&#8217;&#160;&#160;
                                        Claims,&#160; the Settled Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims, and the Settled Litigation Claims.</font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                                      </font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> (jj)&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Settled Defendants&#8217; Claims&#8221; means all Claims that arise out of
                                        or are based upon the commencement, litigation, or settlement of the Actions; </font><font style="font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">provided, however</font><font style="font-family: Arial;">, that the Settled
                                        Defendants&#8217; Claims shall not include any Claims arising out of, based upon, or relating to the enforcement of the Settlement.</font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                                      </font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> (kk)&#160;&#160; &#8220;Settled Litigation Claims&#8221; means all Claims against any of the
                                        Released Parties, concerning or arising from the commencement, litigation, or settlement of the Claims asserted in the Actions; </font><font style="font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">provided, however</font><font style="font-family: Arial;">, that the Settled Litigation Claims shall not include any Claims arising out of, based upon, or relating to the enforcement of the Settlement.</font></font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                                      </font></font></font></div>
                                <font style="font-family: Arial;"> </font></div>
                              <div style="text-indent: 54pt;">
                                <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                  <div class="BRPFPageFooter" style="width: 100%;">
                                    <div>
                                      <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                                          <tr>
                                            <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- - 14 - -</font></td>
                                          </tr>
                                          <tr>
                                            <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt; border-top: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                              <div style="font-family: Arial; text-align: center;">AMENDED STIPULATION AND AGREEMENT OF COMPROMISE, SETTLEMENT, AND RELEASE</div>
                                            </td>
                                          </tr>

                                      </table>
                                    </div>
                                  </div>
                                  <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                    <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin-top: 4px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 4px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"></div>
                                  <div class="BRPFPageHeader" style="width: 100%;"></div>
                                </div>
                                <div><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;">(ll)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#8220;Settled Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims&#8221; means any and all manner of Claims, including Unknown Claims, that have been or
                                        could have been asserted in any forum derivatively or by</font></font></font><font style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;">
                                      Apple </font></font>directly, arising from any act or omission alleged or claims asserted in the Actions;<font style="font-style: italic;"> provided, however,</font> that the Settled Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims shall not
                                  include any Claims arising out of, based upon, or relating to the enforcement of the Settlement. For the avoidance of doubt, the Settled Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims do not cover, settle, or release any direct claims held by a
                                  Plaintiff as a member of the certified class in the Federal Securities Action.</div>
                                <div> <br>
                                </div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"> (mm)<font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;">&#160; </font></font></font>&#8220;Settlement&#8221; means the settlement by and among the Parties on
                                  the terms and conditions set forth in this Stipulation.</div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"> <br>
                                </div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"> (nn)<font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font></font>&#8220;Settlement Fairness Hearing&#8221; means the hearing set by the
                                  Court to, among other things, consider final approval of the Settlement.</div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"> <br>
                                </div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"> (oo)<font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font></font>&#8220;Unknown Claims&#8221; shall mean any Settled Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims
                                  which any Plaintiff, the Company, or any Current Apple Shareholders does not know or suspect to exist in his, her, or its favor at the time of the release of such claims and any Settled Defendants&#8217; Claims which any
                                  Defendant, or the Company does not know or suspect to exist in his, her, or its favor at the time of the release of such claims, which, if known by him, her, or it, might have affected his, her, or its decision(s) with
                                  respect to this Settlement. With respect to any and all Settled Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims and Settled Defendants&#8217; Claims, the Parties stipulate and agree that, upon the Effective Date of the Settlement, Plaintiffs, Defendants,
                                  the Company, and Current Apple Shareholders shall be deemed to have, and by operation of the Judgment shall have, expressly waived any and all provisions, rights, and benefits conferred by any law of any state or territory
                                  of the United States, or principle of common law or foreign law, which is similar, comparable, or equivalent to California Civil Code &#167;1542, which provides:</div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"> <br>
                                </div>
                                <div>
                                  <div>
                                    <div style="margin: 0px 54pt; font-size: 10pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;">A </font>general release does not extend to claims that the creditor or releasing party does not know
                                      or suspect to exist in his or her favor at the time of executing the release and that, if known by him or her, would have materially affected his or her settlement with the debtor or released party.</div>
                                  </div>
                                </div>
                                <div>
                                  <div>
                                    <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="text-align: justify;"> <br>
                                      </font></div>
                                    <font style="text-align: justify;"> </font> </div>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                              <div style="text-align: justify;">Any of Plaintiffs, Defendants, Apple, or Current Apple Shareholders may hereafter discover facts in addition to or different from those which he, she, or it now knows or believes to be true
                                with respect to the Settled Claims but, upon the Court&#8217;s entry of the Judgment, Plaintiffs, Defendants, Apple, and each of the Current Apple Shareholders shall be deemed to have, and by operation of the Judgment shall have,
                                fully, finally, and forever settled any and all Settled Claims without regard to the subsequent discovery or existence of such different or additional facts. Plaintiffs, Defendants, and the Company acknowledge that the
                                foregoing waiver was separately bargained for and a key element of the Settlement.<br>
                              </div>
                              <div style="text-align: justify;"> <br>
                              </div>
                              <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                <div class="BRPFPageFooter" style="width: 100%;">
                                  <div>
                                    <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                                        <tr>
                                          <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- - 15 - -</font></td>
                                        </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                          <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt; border-top: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                            <div style="font-family: Arial; text-align: center;">AMENDED STIPULATION AND AGREEMENT OF COMPROMISE, SETTLEMENT, AND RELEASE</div>
                                          </td>
                                        </tr>

                                    </table>
                                  </div>
                                </div>
                                <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                  <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                <div class="BRPFPageHeader" style="width: 100%;"></div>
                              </div>
                              <div>
                                <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold;"><u>THE SETTLEMENT CONSIDERATION</u></div>
                              </div>
                              <div><br>
                              </div>
                              <div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">2.</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;">In consideration for the full settlement and release of all Settled Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims against the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties and the dismissal with prejudice of the Actions on the terms and
                                      conditions set forth in this Stipulation, Defendants and the Company agree that Apple shall adopt and implement the Enhancements identified in Exhibit A hereto in the time and manner specified therein. The Board, on
                                      behalf of the Company, and in a determination made in the good faith exercise of the Board&#8217;s business judgment, acknowledges and agrees that the filing of, pendency of, and/or settlement demands made in the Actions
                                      caused Apple to adopt, implement, and/or&#160; maintain the Enhancements. The Board further acknowledges and agrees that (i) the Enhancements confer substantial benefits upon Apple and its shareholders; and (ii) Apple&#8217;s
                                      commitment to adopt, implement, and/or maintain the Enhancements will serve Apple and its shareholders&#8217;&#160; best interests&#160; and&#160; constitutes fair, reasonable and&#160; adequate consideration&#160; for the release of the Settled
                                      Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims.</font> </font></div>
                              </div>
                              <div><br>
                              </div>
                              <div>
                                <div style="font-size: 10pt;">
                                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial; text-indent: 27pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Company&#8217;s adoption, implementation, and/or maintenance of the Enhancements shall constitute full and final satisfaction of all of the
                                    Settled Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims.</div>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                              <div><br>
                              </div>
                              <div>
                                <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold;"><u>RELEASE OF CLAIMS</u></div>
                              </div>
                              <div><br>
                              </div>
                              <div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">4.</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial;">The obligations incurred pursuant to
                                      this Stipulation are in consideration of the full and final disposition of the Actions as against Defendants and the Releases provided for herein.</font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: left; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
                                </div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">5.</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial;">Pursuant to the Judgment, without
                                      further action by anyone, upon the Effective Date of the Settlement, Plaintiffs, the Company, and by operation of law the Company&#8217;s shareholders, shall be deemed to have, and by operation of law and of the Judgment,
                                      shall have, fully, finally, and forever discharged, settled, and released, and shall forever be enjoined from commencing or prosecuting, any and all Settled Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims and Settled Litigation Claims (including
                                      Unknown Claims) against the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties. </font></font></div>
                              </div>
                              <div><br>
                              </div>
                              <div class="BRPFPageBreakArea" style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;">
                                <div class="BRPFPageFooter" style="width: 100%;">
                                  <div>
                                    <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                                        <tr>
                                          <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- - 16 - -</font></td>
                                        </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                          <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 8pt; border-top: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                            <div style="font-family: Arial; text-align: center;">AMENDED STIPULATION AND AGREEMENT OF COMPROMISE, SETTLEMENT, AND RELEASE</div>
                                          </td>
                                        </tr>

                                    </table>
                                  </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="BRPFPageBreak" style="page-break-after: always;">
                                  <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                <div class="BRPFPageHeader" style="width: 100%;"></div>
                              </div>
                              <div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">6.</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial;">Pursuant to the Judgment, without
                                      further action by anyone, upon the Effective Date of the Settlement, Defendants and the Company shall be deemed to have, and by operation of law and of the Judgment, shall have, fully, finally, and forever discharged,
                                      settled, and released, and shall forever be enjoined from commencing or prosecuting, any and all Settled Defendants&#8217; Claims and Settled Litigation Claims (including Unknown Claims) against the Released Plaintiffs&#8217;
                                      Parties.</font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                                    </font></font></div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">7.</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial;">Notwithstanding paragraphs 4-6 above,
                                      nothing in the Judgment shall impair or restrict the rights of any Settling Party to enforce the terms of this Stipulation or the Judgment.</font></font></div>
                                <div style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                </div>
                                <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold;"><u>PRELIMINARY APPROVAL</u></div>
                                <div style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                </div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">8.</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial;">Following execution of this
                                      Stipulation, Plaintiffs shall move in the Federal Court for entry of an order (the &#8220;Preliminary Approval Order&#8221;), substantially in the form of Exhibit B attached hereto, requesting: (i) preliminary approval of the
                                      Settlement; (ii) approval of the form and manner of providing notice of the Settlement to Current Apple Shareholders; and (iii) a date and time for the Settlement Fairness Hearing.</font></font></div>
                                <div style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                </div>
                                <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold;"><u>NOTICE</u></div>
                                <div style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                </div>
                                <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">9.</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial;"><font style="font-family: Arial;">Within







                                        ten (10) business days after the entry of the Preliminary Approval Order, the Company shall: (1) post a copy of the Long Form Notice, substantially in the form attached hereto as Exhibit B-1, and the Stipulation (and
                                        exhibits thereto) on the Investor Relations page of the Company&#8217;s website; (2) publish the Summary Notice, substantially in the form attached hereto as Exhibit B-2, in </font><font style="font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">Investor&#8217;s Business Daily </font><font style="font-family: Arial;">and issue a press release with the Summary Notice on GlobeNewswire; and (3) file with the U.S. Securities and Exchange
                                        Commission (&#8220;SEC&#8221;) the Long Form Notice and Stipulation (and exhibits thereto) as exhibits to a Form 8-K, subject to any modifications the Court may require as a condition of approval of the Notice. The Summary
                                        Notice shall provide a link to the Investor Relations page on the Company&#8217;s website where the Long Form Notice and this Stipulation (and exhibits thereto) may be viewed, which page will be maintained through the date
                                        of the final settlement hearing.</font></font></font></div>
                              </div>
                              <div><br>
                              </div>
