                                        <div style="text-align: center; font-weight: bold;">
                                          <div style="font-weight: bold;"><font style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-transform: uppercase;">Exhibit </font>A</div>
                                          <div style="font-weight: bold;"> <br>
                                          </div>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                          <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                            <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"></div>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: right; font-weight: normal;">Exhibit A</div>
                                        <div style="text-align: center; font-weight: bold;"> <br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: center; font-size: 12pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">GOVERNANCE CONSIDERATION</font></div>
                                        <div style="font-size: 12pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);"> <br>
                                          </font></div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">Apple shall adopt and implement the following governance and oversight enhancements (the &#8220;Enhancements&#8221;) within 90 days of
                                            final settlement approval. The Enhancements shall remain in effect for not less than four (4) years. Apple&#8217;s board of directors (the &#8220;Board&#8221;) shall </font>oversee and confirm the timely adoption and effective
                                          implementation of the Enhancements. </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; font-size: 12pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">In the event the Board determines, based upon sound legal advice, that any element of the Enhancements
                                            conflicts with applicable law or regulation, the Board may, in the reasonable and good faith exercise of its business judgment, modify or eliminate provisions of the Enhancements as necessary to conform to the
                                            law or regulation. The Board will endeavor to modify or replace any provision found to conflict with law or regulation with measures designed to accomplish the same or similar objectives of the Enhancements.
                                            Should this occur, the Board shall describe and explain any such changes in the next periodic filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">&#160;</font></div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z14fc47cc850d4f0abd34ff7dd04b6195" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 27pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-weight: bold;"><font style="font-weight: normal;">1.</font></div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-weight: bold;"><u>Enhanced Risk Oversight</u></div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z37ff2e4884d942698df3bf071b0f7d19" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: justify; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">&#8226;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">The Company will amend the Risk Oversight Committee Charter to include a requirement that the Committee review and discuss material regulatory
                                                    compliance issues relating to the Company&#8217;s products, including risks related to performance, manufacturing defects and safety, and the steps management has taken to monitor and mitigate potential product
                                                    regulatory compliance risks.</div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z702523c76b0f40989ecd97094c8580e5" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">&#8226;</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">The Chief Compliance Officer will become a member of the Risk Oversight Committee, attend the meetings thereof and, if necessary, report to the
                                                    Audit and Finance Committee on the matters relating to her duties.</div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z7403f2de6eb94181865dbd09139fd9e2" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">&#8226;</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">
                                                    <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">The Company will ensure that data (including in-store and third-party repair data, social media and other sources) bearing upon Performance
                                                      Management will be actively and regularly monitored, compiled, and made available to leaders on the business teams responsible for product lines, who will evaluate, and, as appropriate, address or
                                                      escalate for further review and oversight, real-time trends and issues.</div>
                                                  </div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><font style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);"> </font><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z6bc16b3215f94866998487494814a0cc" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 36pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify;">o</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">To the extent potentially significant or material business, compliance, financial, reputational or other risks regarding Performance Management are
                                                    suggested by the frequency of repair and/or replacement events, the leaders on the responsible business teams will consider recommendations for further investigation and evaluation, enhanced customer
                                                    communication, and/or customer-oriented remedial action;</div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="zb7d72b0f75e040029bf9fabd83bfdd4f" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">&#8226;</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">The Company shall establish a protocol for report evaluation, recommendation, and escalation, as appropriate. The protocol will incorporate the
                                                    following provisions:</div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                          <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                            <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <div>
                                            <div style="text-align: right; font-weight: normal;">Exhibit A</div>
                                            <div style="text-align: right; font-weight: normal;"> <br>
                                            </div>
                                          </div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="zb9445dfcfa07470592ebbd38fdc85bd9" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 36pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify;">
                                                    <div style="text-align: justify;">o</div>
                                                  </div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div>
                                                    <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">Upon receipt of reports bearing on Performance Management and the related customer experience, leaders on the business teams
                                                        responsible for affected product lines shall evaluate key drivers to determine whether potentially</font>&#160;<font style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">significant or material business, compliance, financial,
                                                        reputational or other risks warrant further evaluation, escalation, and decision-making, including, but not limited to, recommendations for further investigation and evaluation, enhanced customer
                                                        communication, and/or customer-oriented remedial action;</font></div>
                                                  </div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="zcf83ba1a630143fe83b8577953d1b272" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 36pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: justify; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify;">o</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-size: 12pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);"><font style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">In </font>the event that leaders on the business teams
                                                      responsible for product lines determine further action may be necessary, they shall prepare a written report reflecting their evaluation and recommendations. Any further investigation or evaluation
                                                      deemed necessary shall be undertaken immediately and completed within a reasonable time, and the results considered and included in a final escalation report, which shall be provided to the Chief
                                                      Compliance Officer and Chief Operations Officer.</font></div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="zdca3aedb2d4940e2add67d3c5147e11c" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 36pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">
                                                    <div style="text-align: justify;">o</div>
                                                  </div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">The Chief Operations Officer (COO), or a person designated by the COO, shall work directly with the relevant business teams to timely develop and
                                                    implement an action plan designed to address and resolve or mitigate business, compliance, financial and/or reputational risks arising from product field performance and related customer experience
                                                    issues.</div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z4a05c4456f124bc4bab09dd34c3180f6" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 36pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: justify; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify;">o</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div>
                                                    <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">Where,as referenced above, material regulatory compliance issues relating to Performance Management are found by the relevant
                                                        business teams to be significant or potentially material, or other escalation criteria established by the Risk Oversight Committee are met, escalation reports setting out proposed remedial responses
                                                        shall be prepared by the business teams in conjunction with the Chief Compliance Officer and timely presented to the Risk Oversight Committee and, as appropriate, senior executives.</font></div>
                                                  </div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z7d9af79c242344a5860643e56c59b777" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 36pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: justify; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify;">o</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);"><font style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">The </font>Risk Oversight Committee shall review and evaluate the proposed remedial response in
                                                      the escalation report and make any further recommendations as the Committee deems necessary and appropriate to ensure timely and effective risk management and mitigation.</font></div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="zfd3209fd2d1743dd9cca995f03b25c4b" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 27pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-weight: bold;"><font style="font-weight: normal;">2.</font></div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-weight: bold;"><u>Enhanced Oversight of iOS Update Transparency</u></div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z13def412c81746cf961217d0eb610efd" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify;">&#8226;</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="font-size: 12pt;">
                                                    <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">Before release of an iOS update involving changes to Performance Management, the Chief Compliance Officer will
                                                        review iPhone release notes on that topic in order to ensure accurate, timely, and transparent disclosures of such changes.</font></div>
                                                  </div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z79fb83eb072143efb9e7ed3442205a91" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify;">&#8226;</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-size: 12pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);"><font style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">For </font>purposes of this Settlement, &#8220;Performance
                                                      Management&#8221; means dynamically managing performance peaks based in part on the chemical age of an iPhone&#8217;s battery.</font></div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="zd193e03f52a94e73b1b4d1dad6b288db" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify;">&#8226;</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; font-size: 12pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);"><font style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">The </font>Chief Compliance Officer shall work with the
                                                      appropriate business team leaders to ensure that Apple&#8217;s website appropriately identifies and describes the key components of such release notes relating to Performance Management.</font></div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                          <div style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-weight: bold;"> <br>
                                            <div style="text-align: right; font-weight: normal;"><br>
                                            </div>
                                          </div>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="BRPFPageBreakArea" style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;">
                                          <div class="BRPFPageBreak" style="page-break-after: always;">
                                            <hr noshade="noshade" style="margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; border-width: 0px; height: 2px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); clear: both;"></div>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: right; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-weight: normal;">Exhibit A</div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-weight: bold;"><font style="font-weight: normal;"> <br>
                                          </font></div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="zd8c4b7adb54043e4945d3d82a6bb55b0" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 27pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-weight: bold;"><font style="font-weight: normal;">3.</font></div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-weight: bold;"><u>Extension and Expansion of Previously Expired Customer Transparency Commitments</u></div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z83714d19b7404a3bb00d3a798c96772c" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: left; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">&#9642;</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">Apple shall maintain easily accessible and prominent webpage(s) that provide clear and conspicuous information to consumers about lithium-ion
                                                    batteries, unexpected shutdowns, and Performance Management, as defined above. The webpage(s) will provide guidance to consumers on steps they can take to maximize battery health and also describe the
                                                    operation of Performance Management and its impact on iPhone battery and performance.</div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z5d78ae1cdfa14af886cc97185f175a45" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">&#9642;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-size: 12pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;">In the event a future iOS update materially changes the impact of Performance Management, Apple
                                                      shall notify consumers in a clear and conspicuous manner of those changes in the installation notes for the update.</font></div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z4e8bdec4e85a40bc8e73b83fd721feac" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: left; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">&#9642;</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">Apple will provide information to consumers in the iPhone user interface about battery health, and will notify consumers of the option to service
                                                    the battery once the performance of the battery has become significantly degraded.</div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z852ce0da157d4102b34c6cff99e040ac" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">&#9642;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-size: 12pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;">Apple will provide its consumer-facing staff with all necessary education and training regarding:
                                                      (i) the information in the webpage(s) described above; (ii) the iPhone user interface described above; and (iii) where to find further information on Apple webpage(s) or interface relating to
                                                      Performance Management.</font></div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z2f52d685b20b4bc78011325c424db90b" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: left; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">&#9642;</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-size: 12pt;">
                                                    <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32);"><font style="font-size: 10pt;">Apple&#8217;s General Counsel, on an ad hoc basis, will report to the Audit and Finance Committee on any material
                                                        compliance issues related to the above commitments</font></div>
                                                  </div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="z61c575e01b8e4b7f99323a74292cac13" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 27pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-size: 12pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;">4.</font></div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-size: 12pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold;"><u>Enhanced Investor Disclosure Oversight</u></font></div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div>
                                          <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%;" id="zda4b2ffab77b49e39a2893d4888ec932" class="DSPFListTable">

                                              <tr style="vertical-align: top;">
                                                <td style="width: 9pt; text-align: justify;">&#160;</td>
                                                <td style="text-align: right; vertical-align: top; width: 18pt;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify;">&#8226;</div>
                                                </td>
                                                <td style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top; width: auto;">
                                                  <div style="text-align: justify;"><font style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);"><font style="color: rgb(32, 32, 32);">Apple </font>will adopt and implement a written policy that requires the co-Chairs of the
                                                      Disclosure Committee to review transcripts of each earnings call and make appropriate recommendations, as necessary, with respect to correction, clarification, further disclosure or explanation, or
                                                      other actions. The adoption of this policy, and any recommendation made and adopted pursuant to it, do not constitute, and may not be construed as, an admission that any previous statement by any past
                                                      or present employee, officer, or director of the Company was false or misleading.</font></div>
                                                </td>
                                              </tr>

                                          </table>
                                        </div>
                                      </div>
                                      <div><br>
                                      </div>

                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, a consolidated shareholder derivative action is pending in this Court entitled <font style="font-style: italic;">In re Apple Inc. Stockholder Derivative
                                            Litigation</font>, No. 4:19-cv-05153-YGR (the &#8220;Federal Action&#8221;);</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, (a) plaintiffs in the Federal Action: Terrence Zehrer, derivatively on behalf of Apple Inc. (&#8220;Apple&#8221;); Andrew Fine, Tammy Federman SEP/IRA, and The
                                          Rosenfeld Family Foundation, derivatively on behalf of Apple; and John Votto, derivatively on behalf of Apple (collectively, the &#8220;Federal Plaintiffs&#8221;); (b) plaintiffs in the shareholder derivative action pending in
                                          the Superior Court of the State of California, County of Santa Clara (the &#8220;California Court&#8221;), styled as <font style="font-style: italic;">In re Apple Inc. Stockholder Derivative Litigation</font>, Lead Case No.
                                          19CV355213 (the &#8220;California Action&#8221;): Tim Himstreet, derivatively on behalf of Apple; and Steven Hill, derivatively on behalf of Apple (collectively, the &#8220;California Plaintiffs&#8221; ); (c) Apple shareholders Augustin
                                          Sacks and Gerard Bernales, who made a litigation demand on Apple&#8217;s board of directors (the &#8220;Demanding Shareholders&#8221; and, together with the California Plaintiffs and the Federal Plaintiffs, &#8220;Plaintiffs&#8221;); (d)
                                          defendants in the Federal Action and/or the California Action: Timothy D. Cook; Luca Maestri; Craig Federighi; Arthur D. Levinson; Albert Gore, Jr.; Andrea Jung; James A. Bell; Ronald D. Sugar; Robert A. Iger; and
                                          Susan L. Wagner (collectively, &#8220;Defendants&#8221;); and (e) nominal defendant Apple (&#8220;Nominal Defendant,&#8221; &#8220;Apple,&#8221; or the &#8220;Company&#8221; and, together with Plaintiffs and Defendants, the &#8220;Parties&#8221;), by and through their
                                          respective undersigned counsel, have reached a proposed settlement on the terms and conditions set forth in the Amended Stipulation and Agreement of Compromise, Settlement, and Release dated April 29, 2024 (the
                                          &#8220;Amended Stipulation&#8221;) subject to the approval of this Court (the &#8220;Settlement&#8221;);</div>
                                        <div> <br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                          <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageFooter">
                                            <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align: left; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);" id="z390aacec0bdf4afa9bc2eaa7b5c7ea72">

                                                <tr>
                                                  <td style="width: 100%; vertical-align: top; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                                    <div style="border-bottom: #000000; font-size: 8pt; text-align: center;">- <font style="font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">1</font> -</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td style="width: 100%; vertical-align: top; font-size: 8pt;">
                                                    <div style="text-align: center;">[PROPOSED] ORDER PRELIMINARILY APPROVING SETTLEMENT AND AUTHORIZING</div>
                                                    <div style="text-align: center;">DISSEMINATION OF SETTLEMENT NOTICE</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>

                                            </table>
                                          </div>
                                          <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                            <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, except for the terms defined herein, the Court adopts and incorporated the definitions in the Amended Stipulation for purposes of this Preliminary
                                          Approval Order;</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, the Federal Plaintiffs have made an application in this Court, pursuant to Rule 23.1 of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure, for an order preliminarily
                                          approving the Settlement in accordance with the Amended Stipulation and allowing notice to Current Apple Shareholders as more fully described herein;</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, the Court has read and considered: (a) the Federal Plaintiffs&#8217; Motion for Preliminary Approval of the Settlement and authorization to disseminate notice
                                          of the Settlement to Current Apple Shareholders in the time and manner set forth in the Amended Stipulation, and the papers filed and arguments made in connection therewith; and (b) the Amended Stipulation and the
                                          exhibits attached thereto; and</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, unless otherwise defined herein, all capitalized words contained herein shall have the same meanings as they have in the Amended Stipulation;</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">NOW&#160; THEREFORE, IT IS HEREBY ORDERED:</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-weight: bold;"><u>Preliminary Approval of the Settlement</u> </font>&#8211; The Court hereby preliminarily approves the Settlement, as
                                          embodied in the Amended Stipulation and the exhibits attached thereto, subject to further consideration at the Settlement Fairness Hearing to be held as described below.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                          <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageFooter">
                                            <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align: left; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);" id="z8f40a0e3962141b4bea3676f7c8268c7">

                                                <tr>
                                                  <td style="width: 100%; vertical-align: top; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                                    <div style="border-bottom: #000000; font-size: 8pt; text-align: center;">- <font style="font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">2</font> -</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td style="width: 100%; vertical-align: top; font-size: 8pt;">
                                                    <div style="text-align: center;">[PROPOSED] ORDER PRELIMINARILY APPROVING SETTLEMENT AND AUTHORIZING</div>
                                                    <div style="text-align: center;">DISSEMINATION OF SETTLEMENT NOTICE</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>

                                            </table>
                                          </div>
                                          <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                            <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-weight: bold;"><u>Settlement Fairness Hearing</u> </font>&#8211; The Court will hold a hearing (the &#8220;Settlement Fairness Hearing&#8221;) on July
                                          16, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. at the United States District Court for the Northern District of California, Oakland Courthouse, Courtroom 1 &#8211; Fourth Floor, 1301 Clay Street, Oakland, CA 94612, for the following purposes:
                                          (a) to determine whether the proposed Settlement on the terms and conditions provided for in the Amended Stipulation is fair, reasonable, and adequate to Apple and its shareholders, and should be approved by the
                                          Court; (b) to determine whether the Judgment, substantially in the form attached as Exhibit C to the Amended Stipulation, should be entered dismissing the Federal Action with prejudice; (c) to determine whether to
                                          approve the Fee and Expense Amount to Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel, as well as the Service Awards to the Plaintiffs; and (d) to consider any other matters that may properly be brought before the Court in connection with the
                                          Settlement.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Court reserves the right to adjourn the Settlement Fairness Hearing or any adjournment thereof without further notice of any kind other than oral
                                          announcement at the Settlement Fairness Hearing or any adjournment thereof. The Court further reserves the right to approve the Amended Stipulation and the Settlement, at or after the Settlement Fairness Hearing,
                                          with such modifications as may be consented to by the Parties and without further notice to Current Apple Shareholders.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">4. &#160; &#160; &#160; <font style="font-weight: bold;"><u>Manner of Giving Notice</u> </font>&#8211; Notice of the Settlement and the Settlement Fairness Hearing shall be given by
                                          Apple as follows:</div>
                                        <div style="text-indent: 45pt;"> <br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;">(a) By May 7, 2024, the Company shall:</div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;"> <br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify;">(1) post a copy of the Long Form Notice, substantially in the form attached hereto as Exhibit B-1, and the Amended Stipulation (and exhibits thereto) on the Investor Relations page
                                          of the Company&#8217;s website;</div>
                                        <div> <br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify;">(2) publish the Summary Notice, substantially in the form attached hereto as Exhibit B-2, in <font style="font-style: italic;">Investor&#8217;s Business Daily </font>and issue a press
                                          release with the Summary Notice on GlobeNewswire; and (3) file with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (&#8220;SEC&#8221;) the Long Form Notice and Amended Stipulation (and exhibits thereto) as exhibits to a Form 8-K;</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;">(b) the Summary Notice shall provide a link to the Investor Relations page on the Company&#8217;s website where the Long Form Notice and Amended Stipulation (and
                                          exhibits thereto) may be viewed, which page will be maintained through the date of the Settlement Fairness Hearing;</div>
                                        <div> <br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                          <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageFooter">
                                            <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align: left; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);" id="zb4910358bb974954a473f348fea353cd">

                                                <tr>
                                                  <td style="width: 100%; vertical-align: top; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                                    <div style="border-bottom: #000000; font-size: 8pt; text-align: center;">- <font style="font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">3</font> -</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td style="width: 100%; vertical-align: top; font-size: 8pt;">
                                                    <div style="text-align: center;">[PROPOSED] ORDER PRELIMINARILY APPROVING SETTLEMENT AND AUTHORIZING</div>
                                                    <div style="text-align: center;">DISSEMINATION OF SETTLEMENT NOTICE</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>

                                            </table>
                                          </div>
                                          <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                            <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 54pt;">(c) not later than twenty-five (25) calendar days prior to the Settlement Fairness Hearing, Apple&#8217;s Counsel shall serve on Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel and file with the
                                          Court proof, by affidavit or declaration, of compliance with paragraphs 4(a)-(b) above.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-weight: bold;"><u>Approval of Form and Content of Notice</u> </font>&#8211; The Court (a) approves, as to form and content, the Long Form
                                          Notice and Summary Notice, attached hereto as Exhibits B-1 and B-2, respectively, and (b) finds that the distribution of the Notice in the manner and form set forth in paragraph 4 of this Order: (i) constitutes
                                          notice that is reasonably calculated, under the circumstances, to apprise Current Apple Shareholders of the pendency of the Actions, of the effect of the proposed Settlement (including the Releases to be provided
                                          thereunder), of the agreed upon Fee and Expense Amount to Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel, and Service Awards to Plaintiffs, and of their right to appear at the Settlement Fairness Hearing; (ii) constitutes due, adequate and
                                          sufficient notice to all persons and entities entitled to receive notice of the proposed Settlement; and (iii) satisfies the requirements of Rule 23.1 of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure, the United States
                                          Constitution (including the Due Process Clause), and all other applicable law and rules. The date and time of the Settlement Fairness Hearing shall be included in the Long Form Notice and Summary Notice before it
                                          is distributed.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-weight: bold;"><u>Appearance and Objections at Settlement Fairness Hearing</u> </font>&#8211; Any Current Apple Shareholder may file a
                                          written objection to the proposed Settlement, of the agreed-to Fee and Expense Amount and/or Service Awards, and appear at the Settlement Fairness Hearing and show cause, if he, she, or it has any cause, why the
                                          proposed Settlement, the Fee and Expense Amount and/or Service Awards should not be approved; <font style="font-style: italic;">provided, however</font>, that no such person or entity shall be heard or entitled to
                                          contest the approval of the terms and conditions of the proposed Settlement, the Fee and Expense Amount and/or the Service Awards unless that person or entity has filed a written objection with the Court. Any
                                          written objection, together with copies of all other papers and briefs supporting the objection, must be mailed to the Office of the Clerk of the Court, United States District Court for the Northern District of
                                          California, Oakland Division, 1301 Clay Street, Oakland, CA 94612, or filed in person at any location of the United States District Court for the Northern District of California, so that it is filed or postmarked
                                          no later than fourteen (14) calendar days prior to the Settlement Fairness Hearing. Any written objection, together with copies of all other papers and briefs supporting the objection, must also be served to each
                                          of the following Parties&#8217; counsel so that they are received on or before fourteen (14) calendar days prior to the Settlement Fairness Hearing:</div>
                                        <div style="text-indent: 27pt;"> <br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                          <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageFooter">
                                            <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align: left; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);" id="z8bd7f494db2d4a999934246c86642fe8">

                                                <tr>
                                                  <td style="width: 100%; vertical-align: top; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">

                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Any objections, filings, and other submissions must clearly identify the case name and action number, <font style="font-style: italic;">In re Apple Inc.
                                            Stockholder Derivative Litigation</font>, No. 4:19-cv-05153-YGR, and they must: (a) state the name, address, and telephone number of the objector and must be signed by the objector; (b) state whether the objector
                                          is represented by counsel and, if so, the name, address, and telephone number of his, her, or its counsel; (c) contain a specific, written statement of the objection(s) and the specific reason(s) for the
                                          objection(s), including any legal and evidentiary support the objector wishes to bring to the Court&#8217;s attention, and if the objector indicates that he, she, or it intends to appear at the Settlement Fairness
                                          Hearing, the identity of any witnesses the objector may call to testify and any exhibits the objector intends to introduce into evidence at the hearing; and (d) must include documentation sufficient to prove that
                                          the objector owned shares of Apple common stock as of the close of trading on the date of the execution of the Amended Stipulation and continues to hold Apple stock continuously through the date of the Settlement
                                          Fairness Hearing. Any Current Apple Shareholder who or which has filed a written objection in the manner provided herein may also appear at the Settlement Fairness Hearing, either in person or through his, her, or
                                          its own attorney, at his, her, or its own expense.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                          <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageFooter">
                                            <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; text-align: left; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);" id="ze86d12e8af2d47448f365c494b4c2c7a">

                                                <tr>
                                                  <td style="width: 100%; vertical-align: top; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                                    <div style="border-bottom: #000000; font-size: 8pt; text-align: center;">- <font style="font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">5</font> -</div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td style="width: 100%; vertical-align: top; font-size: 8pt;">
                                                    <div style="text-align: center;">[PROPOSED] ORDER PRELIMINARILY APPROVING SETTLEMENT AND AUTHORIZING</div>

                                          <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                            <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Any Apple shareholder who or which does not make his, her, or its objection in the manner provided herein shall be deemed to have waived his, her, or its
                                          right to object to any aspect of the proposed Settlement, including the agreed-to Fee and Expense Amount and Service Awards and shall be forever barred and foreclosed from objecting to the fairness, reasonableness,
                                          or adequacy of the Settlement, the Fee and Expense Amount or Service Awards, or from otherwise being heard concerning the Settlement or the Fee and Expense Amount in this or any other proceeding including any right
                                          of appeal), but shall otherwise be bound by this Order, the Judgment to be entered, and the Releases to be given by the Settlement.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-weight: bold;"><u>Stay and Temporary Injunction</u> </font>&#8211; Until otherwise ordered by the Court, the Court stays all proceedings in
                                          the Federal Action other than proceedings necessary to carry out or enforce the terms and conditions of the Amended Stipulation. Pending final determination of whether the Settlement should be approved, the Court
                                          (a) bars and enjoins the commencement or prosecution of any action asserting any Settled Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims or Settled Litigation Claims against any of the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties; and (b) bars and enjoins the
                                          commencement or prosecution of any action asserting any Settled Defendants&#8217; Claims or Settled Litigation Claims against any of the Released Plaintiffs&#8217; Parties.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">10.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-weight: bold;"><u>Notice Costs</u> </font>&#8211; The Company shall be solely responsible for paying the costs and expenses related to
                                          providing Notice of the Settlement.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                          <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageFooter">

                                                  <td style="width: 100%; vertical-align: top; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">

                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>

                                            <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">11.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-weight: bold;"><u>Use of This Order</u> </font>&#8211; Neither this Order, the Amended Stipulation, including the exhibits thereto, the
                                          negotiations leading to the execution of the Amended Stipulation, nor any proceedings taken pursuant to or in connection the Amended Stipulation, and/or approval of the Settlement (including any arguments proffered
                                          in connection therewith): (a) shall be offered against any of the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties as evidence of, or construed as, or deemed to be evidence of any presumption, concession, or admission by any of the
                                          Released Defendants&#8217; Parties with respect to the truth of any fact alleged by Plaintiffs or the validity of any claim that was or could have been asserted or the deficiency of any defense that has been or could
                                          have been asserted in the Actions or in any other litigation, or of any liability, negligence, fault, violation of law, or other wrongdoing of any kind of any of the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties, or in any way
                                          referred to for any other reason as against any of the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties, in any arbitration proceeding or other civil, criminal, or administrative action or proceeding, other than such proceedings as
                                          may be necessary to effectuate the provisions of Amended Stipulation; (b) shall be offered against any of the Released Plaintiffs&#8217; Parties as evidence of, or construed as, or deemed to be evidence of any
                                          presumption, concession, or admission by any of the Released Plaintiffs&#8217; Parties that any of the Released Plaintiffs&#8217; Parties&#8217; claims are without merit, that any of the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties had meritorious
                                          defenses, or that damages recoverable under the Complaints would not have exceeded the Settlement Consideration or with respect to any liability, negligence, fault, or wrongdoing of any kind, or in any way referred
                                          to for any other reason as against any of the Released Plaintiffs&#8217; Parties, in any arbitration proceeding or other civil, criminal, or administrative action or proceeding, other than such proceedings as may be
                                          necessary to effectuate the provisions of the Amended Stipulation; or (c) shall be construed against any of the Released Parties as an admission, concession, or presumption that the consideration to be given in the
                                          Settlement represents the amount which could be or would have been recovered after trial; <font style="font-style: italic;">provided, however</font>, that if the Amended Stipulation is approved by the Court, the
                                          Parties, the Released Parties, and their respective counsel, may refer to it to effectuate the protections from liability granted hereunder or otherwise to enforce the terms of the Settlement.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">12.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-weight: bold;"><u>Termination of Settlement</u> </font>&#8211; If the Settlement is terminated as provided in the Amended Stipulation, the
                                          Settlement is not approved, or the Effective Date of the Settlement otherwise fails to occur, this Order shall be vacated, rendered null and void, and be of no further force and effect, except as otherwise provided
                                          by the Amended Stipulation, and this Order shall be without prejudice to the rights of the Parties or Current Apple Shareholders, and the Parties shall revert to their respective litigation positions in the Actions
                                          prior to April 1, 2023.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">13.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-weight: bold;"><u>Supporting Papers</u> </font>&#8211; Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel shall file and serve the opening papers in support of the proposed
                                          Settlement, and Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel&#8217;s application for an award of attorneys&#8217; fees and expenses, no later than twenty-one (21) calendar days prior to the Settlement Fairness Hearing; and reply papers, if any, shall
                                          be filed and served no later than seven (7) calendar days prior to the Settlement Fairness Hearing.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 27pt;">14.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Court retains jurisdiction to consider all further applications arising out of or connected with the proposed Settlement.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="text-align: justify; font-weight: bold; text-indent: 27pt;">IT IS SO ORDERED.</div>
                                        <div><br>
                                        </div>

                                                        <div>EX. B-1 - NOTICE OF PENDENCY AND</div>

                                                    <div>
                                                      <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;" id="z5f2eafc548e4489c9bac612d67785983">
