                                                        <div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-style: italic; font-weight: bold;"><u>A Federal Court authorized this Notice. This is not a solicitation from a lawyer.</u></div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-style: italic; font-weight: bold;"><u> <br>
                                                            </u></div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold; text-indent: -27pt; margin-left: 27pt;">TO:&#160;&#160;&#160; ALL PERSONS OR ENTITIES WHO OR WHICH HELD SHARES OF APPLE INC.
                                                            (&#8220;APPLE&#8221; OR THE &#8220;COMPANY&#8221;) COMMON STOCK AS OF THE CLOSE OF TRADING ON APRIL 29, 2024.</div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold;"> <br>
                                                          </div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold; margin-left: 27pt;">THIS NOTICE RELATES TO THE PENDENCY AND PROPOSED SETTLEMENT OF SHAREHOLDER DERIVATIVE
                                                            LITIGATION. PLEASE READ THIS NOTICE CAREFULLY AND IN ITS ENTIRETY. IF YOU ARE A CURRENT APPLE SHAREHOLDER, THIS NOTICE CONTAINS IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT YOUR RIGHTS.</div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold;"> <br>
                                                          </div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold; margin-left: 27pt;">THIS ACTION IS NOT A &#8220;CLASS ACTION.&#8221; THUS, THERE IS NO COMMON FUND UPON WHICH YOU CAN MAKE A
                                                            CLAIM FOR MONETARY PAYMENT. IF YOU DO NOT OBJECT TO THE TERMS OF THE PROPOSED SETTLEMENT OR THE AMOUNT OF ATTORNEYS&#8217; FEES AND EXPENSES DESCRIBED IN THIS NOTICE, YOU ARE NOT OBLIGATED TO TAKE ANY
                                                            ACTION.</div>
                                                        </div>
                                                        <div>
                                                          <div><br>
                                                          </div>
                                                          <div>
                                                            <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                                              <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageFooter">
                                                                <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                                                                    <tr>
                                                                      <td style="width: 100%; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0); text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- 1 -</font></td>
                                                                    </tr>
                                                                    <tr>
                                                                      <td style="width: 100.00%;">
                                                                        <div style="font-size: 8pt;">
                                                                          <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial;">SUMMARY NOTICE OF PENDENCY AND PROPOSED SETTLEMENT OF SHAREHOLDER DERIVATIVE ACTIONS</div>
                                                                        </div>
                                                                      </td>
                                                                    </tr>

                                                                </table>
                                                              </div>
                                                              <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                                                <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                                              <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageHeader"></div>
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div>
                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">The purpose of this Notice is to inform you of: (i) the pendency of the shareholder derivative action
                                                                brought on behalf of Apple Inc. (&#8220;Apple&#8221; or the &#8220;Company&#8221;), styled as <font style="font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">In re Apple Inc.</font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;"> Stockholder Derivative Litigation</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">, Case No. 4:19-cv-05153-YGR (the &#8220;Federal Action&#8221;) , pending in</font> the United States
                                                                District Court for the Northern District of California, Oakland Division (the &#8220;Federal Court&#8221;); the shareholder derivative action brought on behalf of Apple pending in the Superior Court of
                                                                the State of California, County of Santa Clara (the &#8220;California Court&#8221;), styled as <font style="font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">In re Apple Inc.</font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;"> Stockholder Derivative Litigation</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">, Lead Case No. 19CV355213 (the &#8220;California Action&#8221;), and a</font>
                                                                factually-related litigation demand on Apple&#8217;s board of directors (the &#8220;Demand&#8221; and, together with the Federal Action and California Action, the &#8220;Actions&#8221;); and (ii) a proposed settlement of
                                                                the Actions (the &#8220;Settlement&#8221;), subject to approval of the Federal Court. </div>
                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
                                                              </div>
                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">The terms of the settlement are set forth in an Amended Stipulation and Agreement of Compromise,
                                                                Settlement, and Release dated April 29, 2024 (the &#8220; Amended Stipulation&#8221;).<font style="font-family: Arial;"><sup style="vertical-align: text-top; line-height: 1; font-size: smaller;">1</sup> </font>This notice should be read in conjunction with, and is
                                                                qualified in its entirety by reference to, the text of the Amended Stipulation, which has been filed with the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of California. A link to the text of
                                                                the Amended Stipulation and the full-length Notice of Pendency and Proposed Settlement of Shareholder Derivative Actions may be found on the &#8220;Investor Relations&#8221; section of Apple&#8217;s website, <u>investor.apple.com</u>.</div>
                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
                                                              </div>
                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">Under the terms of the Amended Stipulation, as a part of the proposed Settlement, Apple will adopt and/or
                                                                implement corporate governance reforms, which are attached as Exhibit A to the Amended Stipulation (&#8220;Enhancements&#8221;). All Parties agree the Enhancements confer substantial benefits upon Apple
                                                                and its shareholders. In addition, Apple&#8217;s Board, including each of its independent, nonemployee directors (including the members of the DEC), advised by outside counsel for the Company, has
                                                                unanimously approved a resolution reflecting the Board&#8217;s determination, in the good faith exercise of its business judgment, that the Settlement confers substantial benefits upon Apple and its
                                                                shareholders, and that the Settlement and each of its terms are fair and reasonable and serve the best interests of Apple and its shareholders.</div>
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div><br>
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div>
                                                              <hr noshade="noshade" align="left" style="background-color: #000000; border-bottom: medium none; border-left: medium none; border-right: medium none; border-top: medium none; margin: 0px auto 0px 0px; height: 2px; width: 20%; color: #000000; text-align: left;"></div>
                                                            <br>
                                                          </div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><sup style="vertical-align: text-top; line-height: 1; font-size: smaller;">1</sup> All capitalized terms herein have the same meanings as set forth
                                                              in the Amended Stipulation.</font></div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> <br>
                                                            </font></div>
                                                        </div>
                                                        <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                                          <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageFooter">
                                                            <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                                                                <tr>
                                                                  <td style="width: 100%; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0); text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">-
                                                                      2 -</font></td>
                                                                </tr>
                                                                <tr>
                                                                  <td style="width: 100.00%;">
                                                                    <div style="font-size: 8pt;">
                                                                      <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial;">SUMMARY NOTICE OF PENDENCY AND PROPOSED SETTLEMENT OF SHAREHOLDER DERIVATIVE ACTIONS</div>
                                                                    </div>
                                                                  </td>
                                                                </tr>

                                                            </table>
                                                          </div>
                                                          <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                                            <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                                          <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageHeader"></div>
                                                        </div>
                                                        <div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">In light of the substantial benefits conferred upon Apple by Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel&#8217;s efforts, Apple shall pay or
                                                            cause to be paid attorneys&#8217; fees and expenses to Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel in the agreed amount of $6,000,000 (the &#8220;Fee and Expense Amount&#8221;), subject to Court approval. Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel will apply to
                                                            the Court for service awards of $5,000 (&#8220;Service Awards&#8221;) to each of the Plaintiffs to be drawn from the Fee and Expense Amount.</div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                            </font></div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;">
                                                            <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">A Settlement Fairness Hearing will be held on July 16, 2024 at 2:00 p.m., before the Honorable Yvonne
                                                              Gonzalez Rogers at the United States District Court for the Northern District of California, Oakland Courthouse, Courtroom 1 &#8211; Fourth Floor, 1301 Clay Street, Oakland, CA 94612. At the
                                                              Settlement Fairness Hearing, the Federal Court will, among other things: (i) determine whether the proposed Settlement on the terms and conditions provided for in the Amended Stipulation is
                                                              fair, reasonable, and adequate to Apple and its shareholders, and should be approved; (ii) determine whether the Judgment, substantially in the form attached as Exhibit C to the Amended
                                                              Stipulation, should be entered dismissing the Federal Action with prejudice; (iii) determine whether the agreed-to Fee and Expense Amount and Service Awards should be approved; and (iv) consider
                                                              any other matters that may properly be brought before the Federal Court in connection with the Settlement.</div>
                                                          </div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                            </font></div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;">
                                                            <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">Any Current Apple Shareholder who or which continues to own shares of Apple common stock as of July 16, 2024,
                                                              the date of the Settlement Fairness Hearing, has a right, but is not required to, appear and to be heard at the Settlement Fairness Hearing. Any Current Apple Shareholder who satisfies this
                                                              requirement may enter an appearance through counsel of such shareholder&#8217;s own choosing and at such shareholder&#8217;s own expense, or may appear on their own. However, you shall not be heard at the
                                                              Settlement Hearing unless you have filed with the Court, no later than July 2, 2024, a written notice of objection containing the following information: (i) clear identification of the case name
                                                              and case number, <font style="font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">In re Apple Inc. Stockholder Derivative Litigation</font>, Case No. 4:19-cv-05153-YGR; (ii) the name, address, and
                                                              telephone number of the objector and must be signed by the objector; (iii) whether the objector is represented by counsel and, if so, the name, address, and telephone number of his, her, or its
                                                              counsel; (iv) a specific, written statement of the objection(s) and the specific reason(s) for the objection(s), including any legal and evidentiary support the objector wishes to bring to the
                                                              Court&#8217;s attention, and if the objector indicates that he, she, or it intends to appear at the Settlement Fairness Hearing, the identity of any witnesses the objector may call to testify and any
                                                              exhibits the objector intends to introduce into evidence at the hearing; and (v) documentation sufficient to prove that the objector owned shares of Apple common stock as of the close of trading
                                                              on April 29, 2024 and continues to hold Apple stock continuously through the date of the Settlement Fairness Hearing.</div>
                                                          </div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
                                                          </div>
                                                        </div>

                                                                      3 -</font></td>
                                                                </tr>

                                                        </div>
                                                        <div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">If you wish to object to the proposed Settlement, you must file the written objection described above with the
                                                            Court <font style="font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">on or before July 2, 2024. </font>All written objections and supporting papers must be filed with the Office of the
                                                            Clerk of the Court, United States District Court for the Northern District of California, Oakland Division, 1301 Clay Street, Oakland, California 94612, or by filing them in person at any location
                                                            of the United States District Court for the Northern District of California. Current Apple Shareholders who or which file and serve a timely written objection and wish to be heard orally at the
                                                            Settlement Fairness Hearing, must also mail a notice of appearance to the Office of the Clerk of the Court, United States District Court for the Northern District of California, Oakland Division,
                                                            at the address set forth above, or file it in person at any location of the United States District Court for the Northern District of California. Any notice of appearance must also be <font style="font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">filed on or before July 2, 2024</font>.</div>
                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                            </font></div>

                                                            <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">All written objections and supporting papers must also be served to each of the following Parties&#8217; counsel so
                                                              that they are <font style="font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;">received on or before July 2, 2024</font><font style="font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;">:</font></div>

                                                              or its objection in the manner set forth above will be deemed to have waived and forfeited his, her, or its right to object to any aspect of the proposed Settlement; (i) be forever barred and
                                                              foreclosed from objecting to the fairness, reasonableness, or adequacy of the Settlement; and (ii) be deemed to have waived and be forever barred and foreclosed from being heard, in this or any

                                                          <div>
                                                            <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">This Notice summarizes the proposed Settlement. For the precise terms and conditions of the Settlement,
                                                              please see the Amended Stipulation available at the &#8220;Investor Relations&#8221; section of Apple&#8217;s website, <u>investor.apple.com</u>. You may also view a copy of the Amended Stipulation
                                                              by accessing the Court docket in the Federal Action, for a fee, through the Court&#8217;s Public Access to Court Electronic Records (PACER) system at https://ecf.cand.uscourts.gov, or by visiting the
                                                              Office of the Clerk of the Court, United States District Court for the Northern District of California, Oakland Courthouse, 1301 Clay Street, Oakland, CA 94612, between 9:00 a.m. and 4:00 p.m.,
                                                              Monday through Friday, excluding Court holidays. If you have questions regarding the Actions or the Settlement, you may write, call, or email Federal Plaintiffs&#8217; counsel: Craig W. Smith, Robbins
                                                              LLP, 5060 Shoreham Place, Suite 300, San Diego, CA 92122, 619-525-3990, csmith@robbinsllp.com, or David C. Katz, Weiss Law LLP, 305 Broadway, 7th Floor, New York, NY 10007, 212-682-3025,
                                                              dkatz@weisslawllp.com.</div>

                                                              <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold;">THE COURT TO INQUIRE ABOUT THIS SETTLEMENT</div>

                                                                  <tr>
                                                                    <td style="width: 50.00%;">
                                                                      <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;">Dated: May 7, 2024</div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                    <td style="width: 50.00%;">
                                                                      <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;">By Order of the Court</div>
                                                                    </td>
                                                                  </tr>
                                                                  <tr>
                                                                    <td style="width: 50%; font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                    </td>

                                                                        <div style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial;">Case No. 4:19-cv-05153-YGR</div>

                                                                    <tr>

                                                                      <tr>
                                                                        <td style="width: 100.00%;">
                                                                          <div style="font-size: 8pt;">
                                                                            <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial;">[PROPOSED] FINAL JUDGMENT AND ORDER APPROVING DERIVATIVE ACTION SETTLEMENT</div>
                                                                          </div>

                                                                <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                                                  <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                                                <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageHeader"></div>
                                                              </div>
                                                              <!--PROfilePageNumberReset%Num%1%- % -%-->
                                                              <div>
                                                                <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, a consolidated shareholder derivative action is pending in this Court entitled <font style="font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">In re Apple Inc. Stockholder Derivative Litigation</font><font style="font-family: Arial;">, No. 4:19-cv-05153-YGR (the &#8220;Federal Action&#8221;);</font></div>
                                                                <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                  </font>
                                                                  <div>
                                                                    <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, (a) plaintiffs in the Federal Action, Terrence Zehrer, derivatively on behalf of Apple Inc.
                                                                      (&#8220;Apple&#8221;); Andrew Fine, Tammy Federman SEP/IRA, and The Rosenfeld Family Foundation, derivatively on behalf of Apple; and John Votto, derivatively on behalf of Apple (collectively, the
                                                                      &#8220;Federal Plaintiffs&#8221;); (b) plaintiffs in the shareholder derivative action pending in the Superior Court of the State of California, County of Santa Clara (the &#8220;California Court&#8221;),
                                                                      styled<font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"> as </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">In re Apple Inc. Stockholder Derivative
                                                                        Litigation</font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">, Lead Case No. 19CV355213 (the &#8220;California</font> Action&#8221;): Tim Himstreet, derivatively on behalf of Apple; and
                                                                      Steven Hill, derivatively on behalf of Apple (collectively, the &#8220;California Plaintiffs&#8221;); (c) Apple shareholders Augustin Sacks and Gerard Bernales, who made a litigation demand on
                                                                      Apple&#8217;s board of directors (the &#8220;Demanding Shareholders&#8221; and, together with the California Plaintiffs and the Federal Plaintiffs, &#8220;Plaintiffs&#8221;); (d) current and former defendants in the
                                                                      Federal Action and/or the California Action: Timothy D. Cook; Luca Maestri; Craig Federighi; Arthur D. Levinson; Albert Gore, Jr.; Andrea Jung; James A. Bell; Ronald D. Sugar; Robert A.
                                                                      Iger; and Susan L. Wagner (collectively, &#8220;Defendants&#8221;); and (e) nominal defendant Apple Inc. (&#8220;Nominal Defendant,&#8221; &#8220;Apple,&#8221; or the &#8220;Company&#8221; and, together with Plaintiffs and Defendants,
                                                                      the &#8220;Parties&#8221;) have reached a proposed settlement on the terms and conditions set forth in the Amended Stipulation and Agreement of Compromise, Settlement, and Release dated April 29,
                                                                      2024 (the &#8220;Amended Stipulation&#8221;) subject to the approval of this Court (the &#8220;Settlement&#8221;);</div>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                  <div style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                  <div>
                                                                    <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, the Settlement provides for a complete dismissal with prejudice of the claims asserted in
                                                                      the Actions against Defendants;</div>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                  <div style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                  <div>
                                                                    <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, by Order dated April 23, 2024 (the &#8220;Preliminary Approval Order&#8221;), this Court (a)
                                                                      preliminarily approved the Settlement; (b) ordered that notice of the proposed Settlement be provided to Current Apple Shareholders; (c) provided Current Apple Shareholders with the
                                                                      opportunity to object to the proposed Settlement and the agreed-to Fee and Expense Amount to Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel, as well as the Service Awards to Plaintiffs; and (d) scheduled a hearing
                                                                      regarding final approval of the Settlement;</div>
                                                                    <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"> <br>
                                                                    </div>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                  <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                                                    <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageFooter">
                                                                      <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                                                                          <tr>
                                                                            <td style="width: 100%; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                                                              <div style="text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- 1 -</font> <br>
                                                                              </div>
                                                                            </td>
                                                                          </tr>
                                                                          <tr>
                                                                            <td style="width: 100.00%;">
                                                                              <div style="font-size: 8pt;">
                                                                                <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial;">[PROPOSED] FINAL JUDGMENT AND ORDER APPROVING DERIVATIVE ACTION SETTLEMENT</div>
                                                                              </div>
                                                                            </td>
                                                                          </tr>

                                                                      </table>
                                                                    </div>
                                                                    <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                                                      <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                                                    <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageHeader"></div>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                  <div>
                                                                    <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, the Court conducted a hearing on _________ __, 20__ (the &#8220;Settlement Fairness Hearing&#8221;) to
                                                                      consider, among other things, (a) whether the proposed Settlement on the terms and conditions provided for in the Amended Stipulation is fair, reasonable, and adequate to Apple and its
                                                                      shareholders, and should be approved by the Court; (b) whether a judgment should be entered dismissing the Federal Action with prejudice; and (c) whether the agreed-to Fee and Expense
                                                                      Amount and Service Awards should be approved; and</div>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                  <font style="font-size: 10pt;"> </font>
                                                                  <div style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">WHEREAS, it appearing that due notice of the terms of the Settlement and Releases and the Settlement
                                                                    Fairness Hearing has been given in accordance with the Preliminary Approval Order; the Parties having appeared by their respective attorneys of record; the Court having heard and
                                                                    considered evidence in support of the proposed Settlement; the attorneys for the respective Parties having been heard; an opportunity to be heard having been given to all other persons or
                                                                    entities requesting to be heard in accordance with the Preliminary Approval Order; the Court having determined that notice to Current Apple Shareholders was adequate and sufficient; and
                                                                    the entire matter of the proposed Settlement having been heard and considered by the Court.</div>
                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                    </font></div>
                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;">
                                                                    <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, IT IS HEREBY ORDERED, ADJUDGED, AND DECREED, this ___ day of ___________________,
                                                                      2024, as follows:</div>
                                                                  </div>
                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                    </font>
                                                                    <div>
                                                                      <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">1. &#160; &#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Definitions</u> </font>&#8211; Unless
                                                                        otherwise defined in this Judgment, the capitalized terms used herein shall have the same meaning as they have in the Amended Stipulation.</div>
                                                                    </div>
                                                                    <div style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                    </div>
                                                                    <div>
                                                                      <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Jurisdiction</u> </font>&#8211; The
                                                                        Court has jurisdiction over the subject matter of the Federal Action, including all matters necessary to effectuate the Settlement and this Judgment and over all Parties.</div>
                                                                    </div>
                                                                    <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                    </font>
                                                                    <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">3.&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Incorporation of Settlement
                                                                          Documents</u> </font>&#8211; This Judgment incorporates and makes a part hereof: (a) the Amended Stipulation filed with the Court on _____________, 2024; and (b) the Notice, which was
                                                                      filed with the Court on _____________, 2024.</div>
                                                                    <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                      </font></div>
                                                                    <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;">
                                                                      <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;">
                                                                        <div style="text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">4.&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160; </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Derivative
                                                                              Action Properly Maintained; Adequacy of Plaintiffs and Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel</u> </font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">&#8211; Based on the record in the Federal Action, each of the
                                                                            provisions of Rule 23.1 of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure has been satisfied and the Federal Action has been properly maintained according to Rule 23.1. The Federal
                                                                            Plaintiffs, the Federal Plaintiffs&#8217; Co-Lead Counsel and the California Plaintiffs and their counsel have adequately represented the interests of Apple and&#160; its shareholders both in
                                                                            terms of litigating the Federal Action and for purposes of entering into and implementing the Settlement. Each Party and their Counsel have complied with the applicable
                                                                            requirements of good faith litigation and no action, allegation, position taken, or filing was undertaken or made in bad faith or in violation of Rule 11 of the Federal Rules of
                                                                            Civil Procedure or comparable provision of state law.</font></div>
                                                                        <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"> </font><br>
                                                                        </div>
                                                                        <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                                                          <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageFooter">
                                                                            <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                                                                                <tr>
                                                                                  <td style="width: 100%; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                                                                    <div style="text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- 2 -</font> <br>
                                                                                    </div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                </tr>
                                                                                <tr>
                                                                                  <td style="width: 100.00%;">
                                                                                    <div style="font-size: 8pt;">
                                                                                      <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial;">[PROPOSED] FINAL JUDGMENT AND ORDER APPROVING DERIVATIVE ACTION SETTLEMENT</div>
                                                                                    </div>
                                                                                  </td>
                                                                                </tr>

                                                                            </table>
                                                                          </div>
                                                                          <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                                                            <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                                                          <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageHeader"></div>
                                                                        </div>
                                                                        <div>
                                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">5.&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Notice</u> </font>&#8211; The Court
                                                                            finds that the dissemination of the Notice: (a) was implemented in accordance with the Preliminary Approval Order; (b) constituted notice that was reasonably calculated, under the
                                                                            circumstances, to apprise Current Apple Shareholders of: (i) the pendency of the Actions; (ii) the effect of the proposed Settlement (including the Releases to be provided
                                                                            thereunder); (iii) the agreed-to Fee and Expense Amount, as well as the Service Awards (iv) their right to object to the Settlement and/or the Fee and Expense Amount and/or Service
                                                                            Awards; and (v) their right to appear at the Settlement Fairness Hearing; (c) constituted due, adequate, and sufficient notice to all persons and entities entitled to receive
                                                                            notice of the proposed Settlement; and (d) satisfied the requirements of Rule 23.1 of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure, the United States Constitution (including the Due
                                                                            Process Clause), and all other applicable law and rules.</div>
                                                                          <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
                                                                            </font>
                                                                            <div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">6. &#160;&#160; &#160; </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Final Settlement Approval and Dismissal of Claims</u> </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">&#8211; Pursuant
                                                                                  to, and in</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;"> accordance with, Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 23.1, this Court hereby fully and finally approves the Settlement set forth
                                                                                  in the Amended Stipulation in all respects (including, without limitation: the Settlement consideration; the Releases, including the release of the Settled Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims
                                                                                  as against the Released Defendant Parties; and the dismissal with prejudice of the claims asserted against Defendants in the Federal Action), and finds that the Settlement
                                                                                  is, in all respects, fair, reasonable, and adequate to the Company and its shareholders. The Parties are directed to implement, perform, and consummate the Settlement in
                                                                                  accordance with the terms and provisions contained in the Amended Stipulation.</font></div>
                                                                              <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                              </font>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160; The Federal Action and all of the claims asserted
                                                                                  against all Defendants in the Federal Action by the Federal Plaintiffs are hereby dismissed with prejudice. The Parties shall bear their own costs and expenses, except as
                                                                                  otherwise expressly provided in the Amended Stipulation and this Judgment</font>.</div>
                                                                              <br>
                                                                            </div>
                                                                            <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                                                              <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageFooter">
                                                                                <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                                                                                    <tr>
                                                                                      <td style="width: 100%; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                                                                        <div style="text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- 3 -</font> <br>
                                                                                        </div>
                                                                                      </td>
                                                                                    </tr>
                                                                                    <tr>
                                                                                      <td style="width: 100.00%;">
                                                                                        <div style="font-size: 8pt;">
                                                                                          <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial;">[PROPOSED] FINAL JUDGMENT AND ORDER APPROVING DERIVATIVE ACTION SETTLEMENT</div>
                                                                                        </div>
                                                                                      </td>
                                                                                    </tr>

                                                                                </table>
                                                                              </div>
                                                                              <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">
                                                                                <hr noshade="noshade" style="border-width: 0px; clear: both; margin: 4px 0px; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000;"></div>
                                                                              <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageHeader"></div>
                                                                            </div>
                                                                            <div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">8.&#160; &#160; &#160; <font style="font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Binding Effect</u> </font>&#8211;
                                                                                The terms of the Amended Stipulation and of this Judgment shall be forever binding on the Parties and all Apple shareholders, as well as their respective successors and
                                                                                assigns.</div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                                </font></div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">9.&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Releases</u> </font>&#8211; The
                                                                                Releases set forth in paragraphs 4, 5, and 6 of the Amended Stipulation, together with the definitions contained in paragraph 1 of the Amended Stipulation relating thereto, are
                                                                                expressly incorporated herein in all respects. The Releases are effective as of the Effective Date. Accordingly, this Court orders that:</div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                                </font></div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 54pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Without further action by anyone, and subject to paragraph 10 below, upon the
                                                                                Effective Date of the Settlement, Plaintiffs, the Company, and by operation of law the Company&#8217;s shareholders shall be deemed to have, and by operation of law and of the
                                                                                Judgment, shall have, fully, finally, and forever discharged, settled, and released, and shall forever be enjoined from commencing or prosecuting, any and all Settled
                                                                                Plaintiffs&#8217; Claims and Settled Litigation Claims (including Unknown Claims) against the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties.</div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                                </font></div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 54pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Without further action by anyone, and subject to Paragraph 10 below, upon the
                                                                                Effective Date of the Settlement, Defendants and the Company shall be deemed to have, and by operation of law and of the Judgment, shall have, fully, finally, and forever
                                                                                discharged, settled, and released, and shall forever be enjoined from commencing or prosecuting, any and all Settled Defendants&#8217; Claims and Settled Litigation Claims (including
                                                                                Unknown Claims) against the Released Plaintiffs&#8217; Parties.</div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                                </font></div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">10.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Notwithstanding paragraphs 9(a)-(b) above, nothing in this Judgment shall impair or
                                                                                restrict the rights of any of the Parties to enforce the terms of the Amended Stipulation or this Judgment.</div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                                </font></div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">11. &#160; &#160; <font style="font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>No Admissions</u> </font>&#8211;
                                                                                Neither this Judgment, the Amended Stipulation, including the exhibits thereto, the negotiations leading to the execution the Amended Stipulation, nor any proceedings taken
                                                                                pursuant to or in connection with the Amended Stipulation, and/or approval of the Settlement (including any arguments proffered in connection therewith):</div>
                                                                            </div>
                                                                            <br>
                                                                          </div>
                                                                          <div style="clear: both; margin-top: 10pt; margin-bottom: 10pt;" class="BRPFPageBreakArea">
                                                                            <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageFooter">
                                                                              <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; width: 100%;">

                                                                                  <tr>
                                                                                    <td style="width: 100%; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
                                                                                      <div style="text-align: center; font-size: 8pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 8pt; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;">- 4 -</font> <br>
                                                                                      </div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                  </tr>
                                                                                  <tr>
                                                                                    <td style="width: 100.00%;">
                                                                                      <div style="font-size: 8pt;">
                                                                                        <div style="text-align: center; font-family: Arial;">[PROPOSED] FINAL JUDGMENT AND ORDER APPROVING DERIVATIVE ACTION SETTLEMENT</div>
                                                                                      </div>
                                                                                    </td>
                                                                                  </tr>

                                                                            <div style="page-break-after: always;" class="BRPFPageBreak">

                                                                            <div style="width: 100%;" class="BRPFPageHeader"></div>
                                                                          </div>
                                                                          <div>
                                                                            <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;">
                                                                              <div style="text-indent: 54pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; shall be offered against any of the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties as evidence of, or construed as, or deemed
                                                                                  to be evidence of any presumption, concession, or admission by any of the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties with respect to the truth of any fact alleged by Plaintiffs or the
                                                                                  validity of any claim that was or could have been asserted or the deficiency of any defense that has been or could have been asserted in the Actions or in any other
                                                                                  litigation, or of any liability, negligence, fault, violation of law, or other wrongdoing of any kind of any of the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties or in any way referred to for
                                                                                  any other reason as against any of the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties, in any arbitration proceeding or other civil, criminal, or administrative action or proceeding, other
                                                                                  than such proceedings as may be necessary to effectuate the provisions of the Amended Stipulation;</font></div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                                </font></div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 54pt;">(b) &#160; &#160; shall be offered against any of the Released Plaintiffs&#8217; Parties as evidence of, or
                                                                                construed as, or deemed to be evidence of any presumption, concession, or admission by any of the Released Plaintiffs&#8217; Parties that any of the Released Plaintiffs&#8217; Parties&#8217;
                                                                                claims are without merit, that any of the Released Defendants&#8217; Parties had meritorious defenses, or that damages recoverable under the Complaints would not have exceeded the
                                                                                Settlement Consideration or with respect to any liability, negligence, fault, or wrongdoing of any kind, or in any way referred to for any other reason as against any of the
                                                                                Released Plaintiffs&#8217; Parties, in any arbitration proceeding or other civil, criminal, or administrative action or proceeding, other than such proceedings as may be necessary to
                                                                                effectuate the provisions of the Amended Stipulation; or</div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                                </font></div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 54pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; shall be construed against any of the Released Parties as an admission, concession,
                                                                                or presumption that the consideration to be given in the Settlement represents the amount which could be or would have been recovered after trial; <font style="font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">provided, however</font>, that the Parties, the Released Parties, and their respective counsel may refer to this Judgment and the Amended
                                                                                Stipulation to effectuate the protections from liability granted hereunder and thereunder, to support any and all defenses or counterclaims based on <font style="font-family: Arial; font-style: italic;">res judicata</font>, collateral estoppel, release, good-faith settlement, judgment bar or reduction or any other theory of claim preclusion or
                                                                                issue preclusion or similar defense or counterclaim, or otherwise to enforce the terms of the Settlement.</div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 54pt;"> <br>
                                                                              </div>
                                                                              <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;">
                                                                                <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">12.&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Approval of Attorneys&#8217; Fees and Expenses</u> </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">&#8211; The Fee and
                                                                                    Expense Amount and</font><font style="font-size: 10pt;"> Service Awards are hereby approval approved as fair and reasonable. The Fee and Expense Amount shall be paid to
                                                                                    Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel in accordance with the terms of the Amended Stipulation.</font></div>
                                                                                <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
                                                                                  </font></div>

                                                                                            </div>
                                                                                          </td>
                                                                                        </tr>

                                                                                </div>
                                                                                <div>
                                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">13.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; No proceedings or court order with respect to the attorneys&#8217; fees and expenses
                                                                                    to Plaintiffs&#8217; Counsel shall in any way disturb or affect this Judgment (including precluding this Judgment from being Final or otherwise being entitled to preclusive
                                                                                    effect), and any such proceedings or court order shall be considered separate from this Judgment.</div>
                                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
                                                                                  </div>
                                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;">14.&#160; &#160;&#160; <font style="font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Retention of
                                                                                        Jurisdiction</u> </font>&#8211; Without affecting the finality of this Judgment in any way, this Court retains continuing jurisdiction over the Parties and all Apple
                                                                                    shareholders for purposes of the administration, interpretation, implementation, and enforcement of the Settlement.</div>
                                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
                                                                                  </div>
                                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">15. &#160; &#160; </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Modification of the Amended Stipulation</u> </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">&#8211;
                                                                                      Without further approval from the</font> Court, the Parties are hereby authorized to agree to and adopt such amendments or modifications of the Amended Stipulation or any
                                                                                    exhibits attached thereto to effectuate the Settlement that: (a) are not materially inconsistent with this Judgment; and (b) do not materially limit the rights of the
                                                                                    Company and its shareholders in connection with the Settlement. Without further order of the Court, the Parties may agree to reasonable extensions of time to carry out any
                                                                                    provisions of the Settlement.</div>
                                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
                                                                                  </div>
                                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">16. &#160; &#160; </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Termination of Settlement</u> </font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">&#8211; If the Settlement is terminated
                                                                                      as provided in the</font> Amended Stipulation or the Effective Date of the Settlement otherwise fails to occur, this Judgment shall be vacated, rendered null and void,
                                                                                    and be of no further force and effect, except as otherwise provided by the Amended Stipulation, and this Judgment shall be without prejudice to the rights of the Parties or
                                                                                    any Current Apple Shareholders, and the Parties shall revert to their respective litigation positions in the Actions as of April 1, 2023.</div>
                                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <br>
                                                                                  </div>
                                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; text-indent: 27pt;"><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">17.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-weight: bold;"><u>Entry of Final Judgment</u> </font><font style="font-size: 10pt;">&#8211; There is no just reason to delay
                                                                                      the entry of this Judgment</font> as a final judgment in the Federal Action. Accordingly, the Clerk of the Court is expressly directed to immediately enter this final
                                                                                    judgment in the Federal Action.</div>
                                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;"> <font style="font-size: 10pt;"><br>
                                                                                    </font></div>
                                                                                  <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;">
                                                                                    <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: bold; margin-left: 27pt;">IT IS SO ORDERED.</div>
                                                                                    <div style="text-align: left; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; font-weight: 400;"> <br>

<td>duration</td>
</tr>
</table></div>
</div></td></tr>
</table>

<SEQUENCE>12
<FILENAME>Show.js
<DESCRIPTION>IDEA: XBRL DOCUMENT
<TEXT>
// Edgar(tm) Renderer was created by staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Data and content created by government employees within the scope of their employment are not subject to domestic copyright protection. 17 U.S.C. 105.
var Show={};Show.LastAR=null,Show.showAR=function(a,r,w){if(Show.LastAR)Show.hideAR();var e=a;while(e&&e.nodeName!='TABLE')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e||e.nodeName!='TABLE'){var ref=((window)?w.document:document).getElementById(r);if(ref){e=ref.cloneNode(!0);
e.removeAttribute('id');a.parentNode.appendChild(e)}}
if(e)e.style.display='block';Show.LastAR=e};Show.hideAR=function(){Show.LastAR.style.display='none'};Show.toggleNext=function(a){var e=a;while(e.nodeName!='DIV')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e.style){}else if(!e.style.display){}else{var d,p_;if(e.style.display=='none'){d='block';p='-'}else{d='none';p='+'}
e.style.display=d;if(a.textContent){a.textContent=p+a.textContent.substring(1)}else{a.innerText=p+a.innerText.substring(1)}}}
</TEXT>

/* Updated 2009-11-04 */
/* v2.2.0.24 */

/* DefRef Styles */
..report table.authRefData{
	background-color: #def;
	border: 2px solid #2F4497;
	font-size: 1em;
	position: absolute;
}

..report table.authRefData a {
	display: block;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report table.authRefData p {
	margin-top: 0px;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide {
	background-color: #2F4497;
	padding: 1px 3px 0px 0px;
	text-align: right;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide a:hover {
	background-color: #2F4497;
}

..report table.authRefData .body {
	height: 150px;
	overflow: auto;
	width: 400px;
}

..report table.authRefData table{
	font-size: 1em;
}

/* Report Styles */
..pl a, .pl a:visited {
	color: black;
	text-decoration: none;
}

/* table */
..report {
	background-color: white;
	border: 2px solid #acf;
	clear: both;
	color: black;
	font: normal 8pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

..report hr {
	border: 1px solid #acf;
}

/* Top labels */
..report th {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
	text-align: center;
}

..report th.void	{
	background-color: transparent;
	color: #000000;
	font: bold 10pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	text-align: left;
}

..report .pl {
	text-align: left;
	vertical-align: top;
	white-space: normal;
	width: 200px;
	white-space: normal; /* word-wrap: break-word; */
}

..report td.pl a.a {
	cursor: pointer;
	display: block;
	width: 200px;
	overflow: hidden;
}

..report td.pl div.a {
	width: 200px;
}

..report td.pl a:hover {
	background-color: #ffc;
}

/* Header rows... */
..report tr.rh {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
}

/* Calendars... */
..report .rc {
	background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

/* Even rows... */
..report .re, .report .reu {
	background-color: #def;
}

..report .reu td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

/* Odd rows... */
..report .ro, .report .rou {
	background-color: white;
}

..report .rou td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

..report .rou table td, .report .reu table td {
	border-bottom: 0px solid black;
}

/* styles for footnote marker */
..report .fn {
	white-space: nowrap;
}

/* styles for numeric types */
..report .num, .report .nump {
	text-align: right;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

..report .nump {
	padding-left: 2em;
}

..report .nump {
	padding: 0px 0.4em 0px 2em;
}

/* styles for text types */
..report .text {
	text-align: left;
	white-space: normal;
}

..report .text .big {
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	width: 17em;
}

..report .text .more {
	display: none;
}

..report .text .note {
	font-style: italic;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report .text .small {
	width: 10em;
}

..report sup {
	font-style: italic;
}

..report .outerFootnotes {
	font-size: 1em;
}
